text: Nombe achikapolo ŵaali ni achakulu ŵao ŵakukulupilila akasaŵanyosya pakuŵa ali achalongo achinjao mwa Kilisito. Nambo akuŵajilwa kwatumichila uchenene, pakuŵa nombewo akupochela indu yambone kutyochelela mmasengo ga Ŵakilisito ŵakwanonyela. Gelego ni maloŵe gankusachilwa kujiganyikwa ni kulalichikwa.
